lead_paragraph: They are four fighting brothers, each proudly bearing a version of their father's name. They strategize and train and compete together out of their Maryland gym, relentlessly applying teamwork to a profoundly individual sport.

headline.print_headline: Family Looms Large in US Boxer Gary Russell's Olympic Quest
headline.main: Family Looms Large in US Boxer Gary Russell's Olympic Quest
